title: NASDAQ 100 Technical Analysis, Triple Top Formation And Possible Next Move
text:
which is driven mainly by Tech majors has been a favourite for the chart gazers as one step backwards and two steps forward and vice versa is what it takes two to tango.

Looking at 4 Hour time frames we see three clear Tops 7993.75, 7987.75 & 7883.25.

The prices have been attracting sellers from the top and pushing the prices to bottoms of 7806.75 & 7809.75 where buyers supported the price again.

The index is trading currently at 7932.

At this juncture, the price is facing resistance from 7945.

The is getting support from 50 EMA at 7902

Intraday Technical Forecast:

If the price fails to sustain above 7945, sellers will have upper hand pushing the index to 7910-7900. Further weakness can push it down to 7880-7840-7810

If the price decisively trades above 7945, expect buyers who can take the index up towards 7980 and a break above 7998 can open the gates for 8017-8070

100 SMA is crossing over 200 SMA on H4 which shows a temporary bullish case.

MACD histogram is painting above zero line and rising.

Stochastic is inclined in bear zone hinting at a possible fall.
description: Stocks Analysis by Sunil Kumar Dixit covering: Nasdaq 100. Read Sunil Kumar Dixit's latest article on Investing.com
